meanings.definition: One who climbs or scales a wall or other obstacle.
meanings.sent1: The brave escalader reached the top of the wall effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: The skilled escalader used ropes and hooks to conquer the steep cliff.
meanings.sent3: The escalader decided to climb the tree instead of using the stairs for fun.
meanings.sent4: She was a fearless escalader, always seeking new heights to conquer.
meanings.sent5: The young escalader's determination inspired others to overcome challenges.

meanings.definition: A device used for climbing or scaling.
meanings.sent1: The sturdy escalader helped hikers navigate the rocky terrain.
meanings.sent2: The metal escalader was essential for reaching the top of the mountain.
meanings.sent3: The escalader was accidentally left behind during the camping trip.
meanings.sent4: The escalader gleamed in the sunlight, ready for the next adventure.
meanings.sent5: The collapsible escalader was compact and easy to carry on outdoor expeditions.
